content.title: Economic Help To Sahariya Tribal Girl Students (Class 11 And 12)
content.details: To promote girl education by motivating Saharia tribe girl students of Baran district to study in higher education and provide financial assistance to Sahariya tribe girl students for encouragement for higher secondary education. Those who are studying regularly in government schools in higher secondary classes (11th and 12th) and who have not got accommodation in government hostels.
benefits: The student will be paid Rs. 3,500/- for a total of 10 months at the rate of Rs. 350/- per month.
eligibility: The girl student should belong to the Saharia tribe of the Baran district of Rajasthan.
The girl child should be studying regularly in a government school.
The mother/father/guardian of the student should not be an income taxpayer.
The girl students, who are studying in residential schools/ashram hostels run by the government, they will not be entitled.
Vaidya Bhamashah card and Aadhaar should be there.
Students should be a native of Rajasthan.
content.application_process: Online. Applicants have to visit the official web portal, click on 'Online Portal For Tad Educational Incentive Schemes', log in or create an SSO ID, and fill out the required academic information.

faqs.question: What is this scheme?
faqs.answer: Rajasthan Government started a scholarship for Sahariya tribal girls' higher education (Class 11 and 12).

faqs.question: What Are The Benefits Under The Scheme?
faqs.answer: The student will be paid Rs. 3,500/- for a total of 10 months at the rate of Rs. 350/- per month.

faqs.question: Who Can Get The Benefits Of The Scheme?
faqs.answer: The girl student should belong to the Saharia tribe of the Baran district of Rajasthan.

faqs.question: May other state person apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: No, only Rajasthan residents may apply for the scheme.

faqs.question: How To Apply For The Scheme?
faqs.answer: Applicants have to visit the official web portal, click on 'Online Portal For Tad Educational Incentive Schemes', follow the instructions, and fill out all required academic information.

faqs.question: What Documents Are Needed?
faqs.answer: Caste Certificate Copy, Education Qualification Marksheet / Certificate Copy, Aadhar Card Copy, Jan Aadhar/Bhamashah Card Copy, Income Certificate Copy.

faqs.question: What is the official portal to apply?
Can All girl students get the scheme benefits?
faqs.answer: The girl students, who belong to the Saharia tribe of the Baran district of Rajasthan, can get the scheme benefits.

faqs.question: Can boy students also apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: No, this is only for girl students.
